text: Robert Fripp (born 16 May 1946, Wimborne Minster, Dorset, England) is an English guitarist, songwriter and record producer. He was ranked 42 on Rolling Stone magazine's 2003 list of the "100 Greatest Guitarists of All Time". He is founder member of rock band King Crimson. Fripp has been married to Toyah Willcox since 1986. His uncle was Alfie Fripp. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:English rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Dorset
title: Robert Fripp
